content:
Diagnosis:
Basal cell carcinoma right forehead

Previous treatment:
Excision March 2024 with clear margins

Current situation:
Routine follow-up review

I reviewed [redacted name] today for routine follow-up following excision of a right forehead BCC. The surgical site has healed well with an acceptable cosmetic outcome. There is no evidence of recurrence on careful examination of the scar and surrounding skin. No suspicious lesions were identified on full skin examination. The patient reports no new concerning skin changes.

Plan:
No active issues requiring intervention. Annual surveillance recommended with dermatology. Patient advised regarding sun protection and skin self-examination. Will review again in clinic in 12 months, or sooner if new concerns arise.

cancer_timeline.value: Surgical site well healed with acceptable cosmetic outcome, no evidence of recurrence

patient_facts.value: No suspicious lesions on full skin examination
Well-healed surgical scar with no evidence of recurrence

status_updates.value: Right forehead BCC treated with surgical excision. No evidence of recurrence at follow-up
Annual surveillance with dermatology, review in clinic in 12 months
